trans-unit.source: Represents the default settings for <xref:System.Data.DataView.ApplyDefaultSort*>, <xref:System.Data.DataView.DataViewManager*>, <xref:System.Data.DataView.RowFilter*>, <xref:System.Data.DataView.RowStateFilter*>, <xref:System.Data.DataView.Sort*>, and <xref:System.Data.DataView.Table*> for DataViews created from the <xref href="System.Data.DataViewManager"></xref>.
Gets or sets a value indicating whether to use the default sort.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the default sort is used; otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Gets or sets the filter to apply in the <xref href="System.Data.DataView"></xref>.
See <xref:System.Data.DataView.RowFilter*> for a code sample using RowFilter.
A string that contains the filter to apply.
Gets or sets a value indicating whether to display Current, Deleted, Modified Current, ModifiedOriginal, New, Original, Unchanged, or no rows in the <xref href="System.Data.DataView"></xref>.
The default value of RowStateFilter is `DataViewRowState.CurrentRows`.
A value that indicates which rows to display.
Gets or sets a value indicating the sort to apply in the <xref href="System.Data.DataView"></xref>.
<xref:System.Data.DataView.Sort%2A> can have two defaults based on the value of <xref:System.Data.DataView.RowFilter%2A> property.

If <xref:System.Data.DataView.RowFilter%2A> is null or empty (that is, the value is not explicitly specified), the <xref:System.Data.DataRowView> in the <xref:System.Data.DataView> is sorted on the position or ordinal of <xref:System.Data.DataRow> in the <xref:System.Data.DataTable.Rows%2A> collection.

The <xref:System.Data.DataView.Sort%2A> default, an empty string, causes a <xref:System.Data.DataRowView> in <xref:System.Data.DataView> to be sorted on the position or ordinal of <xref:System.Data.DataRow> in the <xref:System.Data.DataTable.Rows%2A> collection.
The sort to apply in the <xref href="System.Data.DataView"></xref>.
Gets the <xref href="System.Data.DataTable"></xref> to which the <xref href="System.Data.DataViewSetting"></xref> properties apply.
